serieslog: In this chat you'll learn how to get started playing Golfcraft.
title: Golfstory

story.name: Ash
content: \raise_golfclub Hello! You look like you might be new here. I'm Arnold. \raise_golfclub Welcome to Golfcraft!

story.name: Back
content: \raise_golfclub Hi, I'm Mickey. Arnold and I used to be famous golfers. Now we get to greet new players here at Golfcraft. \raise_golfclub

story.name: Dog
content: Have you ever played golf before?
Then you've got a head start!
That's too bad. If you were a golfer, you might have an advantage in this game.

story.name: Egg
content: Arnold, I beg to differ. We've discussed this before. Remember, Golfcraft isn't like real golf.

story.name: Fox
content: Oh right. I keep forgetting. But it's a game of skill. Isn't that right, Mickey?

story.name: Gig
content: Yes, it takes practice. \raise_golfclub

story.name: Ice
content: Have you ever played mini-golf?
Excellent!
Really? That's a shame. It's a wonderful family sport. But never mind.

story.name: Chain
content: In Golfcraft the objective is to tap a ball with a club to hit glowing objects on the table. It's a bit like mini-golf.

story.name: Jake
content: Except you're trying to hit the glowing object instead of putting the ball into a hole.

story.name: King
content: Does that make sense?
I can tell you're a quick learner.
Don't worry. It'll make sense once you try it.

story.name: Horse
content: I bet you're wondering what it costs to get started. People are always asking us that.

story.name: Lash
content: The good news is it doesn't cost anything to get started. And if you develop your skill, you can even win prizes!

story.name: Mute
content: Do you like winning free stuff?
Of course you do.
Really? Wow.

story.name: Net
content: Mickey and I would like to see you give Golfcraft a try. Come over here and have a look at the boards. \goto_training_leaderboard

story.name: Oak
content: Here's the training leaderboard. It shows the names of the top players who've scored the most during training.

story.name: Page
content: What do you think friend. Think you can make it onto the leaderboard?
That's the spirit!
Don't sell yourself short. It's all about attitude!

story.name: Quill
content: And here's the training board. \goto_training_board This is where you come to do your training. Your training sessions will show up on these boards so you can keep track.

story.name: Raft
content: The goal is to complete levels. Come over here and look at the Level board. \goto_level_board This board is just for you.

story.name: Scout
content: When you complete a level it will show up on this board.

story.name: Tide
content: You're going to have so much fun! I wish I could train, but I'm too old.

story.name: Use
content: Are you ready to give it a try?
Great!
I wish you'd try it. It would make me and Mickey very happy.

story.name: Vast
content: Come over here to the training board. \goto_training_board.

story.name: Winch
content: Do you see where it says Play?
Good.
It's right there in big bright letters. PLAY.

story.name: Xray
content: Just point your cursor at the Play button and click it. Then you'll be on your way. It was great talking to you. Goodluck!

story.name: Yacht
content: Happy training! We'll be anxious to see how it goes. Good luck!!
